20110115060023.000|20110115060023.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110115060023.000|20110115060024.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS NOBODY THERE.      
20110115060024.000|20110115060027.000|CC1|IT REALLY HIT HOME WHEN I SAW

20110115060029.000|20110115060030.000|CC1|AND I TURNED TO THE NEIGHBOR AND
20110115060030.000|20110115060033.000|CC1|I SAID, DID SHE TELL YOU SHE WAS
20110115060033.000|20110115060033.000|CC1|GOING?                          
20110115060033.000|20110115060035.000|CC1|BECAUSE ANY TIME SHE WENT       
20110115060035.000|20110115060036.000|CC1|ANYWHERE, ALWAYS THE NEIGHBOR OR
20110115060036.000|20110115060038.000|CC1|MYSELF WHO FED THE ANIMALS.     
20110115060038.000|20110115060039.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SO WHAT DID YOU DO?
20110115060039.000|20110115060043.000|CC1|DID YOU CALL POLICE?            
20110115060043.000|20110115060044.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110115060044.000|20110115060047.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DETECTIVES SEARCHED
20110115060047.000|20110115060050.000|CC1|THE HOUSE.                      
20110115060050.000|20110115060050.000|CC1|SLOWLY.                         
20110115060050.000|20110115060053.000|CC1|METHODICALLY.                   
20110115060053.000|20110115060055.000|CC1|>> THINGS WERE RANSACKED WITHIN 
20110115060055.000|20110115060056.000|CC1|THE HOUSE.                      
20110115060056.000|20110115060058.000|CC1|AND THERE WERE A LARGE AMOUNT OF
20110115060058.000|20110115060059.000|CC1|EMPTY BLEACH BOTTLES IN THE     
20110115060059.000|20110115060101.000|CC1|GARAGE AND A TRASH CAN THAT WAS 
20110115060101.000|20110115060103.000|CC1|FILLED WITH A FUNNY LOOKING     
20110115060103.000|20110115060106.000|CC1|LIQUID THAT SMELLED LIKE BLEACH.
20110115060106.000|20110115060107.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND WHEN THEY      
20110115060107.000|20110115060109.000|CC1|OPENED THE LID OF THAT TRASH    
20110115060109.000|20110115060111.000|CC1|CAN, THEY REALIZED THIS WAS A   
20110115060111.000|20110115060114.000|CC1|LOT MORE THAN A MISSING PERSONS 
20110115060114.000|20110115060114.000|CC1|CASE.                           
20110115060114.000|20110115060117.000|CC1|>> WE SAW WHAT WE BELIEVE WAS A 
20110115060117.000|20110115060117.000|CC1|FOREARM.                        
20110115060117.000|20110115060119.000|CC1|AND AT THAT POINT, THAT'S WHEN  
20110115060119.000|20110115060121.000|CC1|WE WERE CERTAIN WE HAD A BODY.  
20110115060121.000|20110115060122.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THEY WEREN'T   
20110115060122.000|20110115060124.000|CC1|ABLE TO DETERMINE IF THE BODY   
20110115060124.000|20110115060125.000|CC1|WAS GINGER'S.                   
20110115060125.000|20110115060126.000|CC1|AND THE NEXT DAY, THEY WERE     
20110115060126.000|20110115060129.000|CC1|STILL TRYING TO IDENTIFY THE    
20110115060129.000|20110115060130.000|CC1|MURDER WEAPON.                  
20110115060130.000|20110115060134.000|CC1|>> IT'S ALL OBVIOUS CUTTING     
20110115060134.000|20110115060135.000|CC1|UTENSILS, PROBABLY BIG KNIVES.  
20110115060135.000|20110115060136.000|CC1|>> DO WE THINK IT COULD HAVE    
20110115060136.000|20110115060137.000|CC1|BEEN ANY OF THE KITCHEN KNIVES? 
20110115060137.000|20110115060141.000|CC1|>> WE HAVEN'T GOT THAT FAR.     
20110115060141.000|20110115060141.000|CC1|WHAT KITCHEN KNIVES WE HAVE     
20110115060141.000|20110115060142.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW ARE TINY STEAK KNIVES 
20110115060142.000|20110115060145.000|CC1|THAT I SEE SITTING OUT IN THE   
20110115060145.000|20110115060145.000|CC1|SINK.                           
20110115060145.000|20110115060147.000|CC1|>> Reporter: A HAZ-MAT TEAM     
20110115060147.000|20110115060148.000|CC1|TRANSPORTED THE TRASH CAN TO THE
20110115060148.000|20110115060149.000|CC1|CLARK COUNTY MEDICAL EXAMINER'S 
20110115060149.000|20110115060152.000|CC1|OFFICE FOR ANALYSIS.            
20110115060152.000|20110115060155.000|CC1|GETTING TO THE BODY ITSELF      
20110115060155.000|20110115060156.000|CC1|WASN'T EASY.                    
20110115060156.000|20110115060158.000|CC1|>> THE TRASH CAN HAD TO BE CUT  
20110115060158.000|20110115060200.000|CC1|OPEN TO ACCESS THE EVIDENCE.    
20110115060200.000|20110115060202.000|CC1|SO THAT'S WHY THE TRASH CAN'S   
20110115060202.000|20110115060207.000|CC1|HERE IN A COUPLE PIECES.        
20110115060207.000|20110115060208.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHY IT IS IMPORTANT
20110115060208.000|20110115060210.000|CC1|TO COME HERE TO THE MORGUE IN AN
20110115060210.000|20110115060212.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION LIKE THIS?        
20110115060212.000|20110115060214.000|CC1|>> THERE'S EVIDENCE A LOT OF    
20110115060214.000|20110115060216.000|CC1|TIMES ASSOCIATED WITH THE BODY. 
20110115060216.000|20110115060217.000|CC1|IF WE DON'T COME HERE TO WITNESS
20110115060217.000|20110115060219.000|CC1|THAT FIRST PART OF IT, THAT CAN 
20110115060219.000|20110115060220.000|CC1|BE CRUCIAL BECAUSE WE MIGHT MISS
20110115060220.000|20110115060223.000|CC1|SOMETHING.                      
20110115060223.000|20110115060225.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THE MORE THEY  
20110115060225.000|20110115060227.000|CC1|INVESTIGATE IT, THE MORE GRISLY 
20110115060227.000|20110115060230.000|CC1|IT BECAME.                      
20110115060230.000|20110115060232.000|CC1|>> IT WAS KIND OF A REAL SURREAL
20110115060232.000|20110115060233.000|CC1|THING BECAUSE I REMEMBER TELLING
20110115060233.000|20110115060234.000|CC1|HIM, GET OFF THE PHONE.

20110115060235.000|20110115060239.000|CC1|SHE'S BEEN CUT IN HALF.         
20110115060239.000|20110115060241.000|CC1|THOSE CUTS ON THE LEG LOOKED TO 
20110115060241.000|20110115060244.000|CC1|BE CONSISTENT WITH TORTURE.     
20110115060244.000|20110115060245.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ONCE THEY REMOVED  
20110115060245.000|20110115060247.000|CC1|THE BODY, THEY FOUND CLUES THAT 
20110115060247.000|20110115060251.000|CC1|MIGHT HELP IN THE               
20110115060251.000|20110115060251.000|CC1|IDENTIFICATION.                 
20110115060251.000|20110115060253.000|CC1|THE TATTERED REMAINS OF A       
20110115060253.000|20110115060254.000|CC1|LEOPARD PATTERNED SHEET.        
20110115060254.000|20110115060255.000|CC1|AND A WOMAN'S RING.             
20110115060255.000|20110115060258.000|CC1|BUT AGAIN, WAS THE VICTIM,      
20110115060258.000|20110115060300.000|CC1|GINGER CANDELA?                 
20110115060300.000|20110115060301.000|CC1|THE RING FOUND ON THE BODY WAS  
20110115060301.000|20110115060303.000|CC1|THEIR BEST CLUE.

20110115060308.000|20110115060310.000|CC1|SHE'S THE ONE HERE LOCALLY.     
20110115060310.000|20110115060314.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S BEEN 40 HOURS 
20110115060314.000|20110115060316.000|CC1|SINCE POLICE DISCOVER THE BODY. 
20110115060316.000|20110115060318.000|CC1|THEY NEED TO ASK TABITHA IF THE

20110115060340.000|20110115060342.000|CC1|HOMICIDE DETECTIVES, IT'S A PART

20110115060354.000|20110115060356.000|CC1|>> DO YOU WANT TO SIT IN YOUR

20110115061619.000|20110115061619.000|CC1|   STAYING ACTIVE CAN ACTUALLY  
20110115061619.000|20110115061622.000|CC1|     EASE ARTHRITIS SYMPTOMS.   
20110115061622.000|20110115061623.000|CC1|    BUT IF YOU HAVE ARTHRITIS,  
20110115061623.000|20110115061623.000|CC1|          STAYING ACTIVE        
20110115061623.000|20110115061625.000|CC1|        CAN BE DIFFICULT.       
20110115061625.000|20110115061625.000|CC1|      PRESCRIPTION CELEBREX     
20110115061625.000|20110115061628.000|CC1| CAN HELP RELIEVE ARTHRITIS PAIN
20110115061628.000|20110115061628.000|CC1|           SO YOUR BODY         
20110115061628.000|20110115061630.000|CC1|       CAN STAY IN MOTION.      
20110115061630.000|20110115061630.000|CC1|         BECAUSE JUST ONE       
20110115061630.000|20110115061633.000|CC1|       200MG CELEBREX A DAY     
20110115061633.000|20110115061635.000|CC1|    CAN PROVIDE 24 HOUR RELIEF  
20110115061635.000|20110115061635.000|CC1|   FOR MANY WITH ARTHRITIS PAIN 
20110115061635.000|20110115061638.000|CC1|        AND INFLAMMATION.       
20110115061638.000|20110115061639.000|CC1|    PLUS, IN CLINICAL STUDIES,  
20110115061639.000|20110115061639.000|CC1|  CELEBREX IS PROVEN TO IMPROVE 
20110115061639.000|20110115061642.000|CC1|     DAILY PHYSICAL FUNCTION    
20110115061642.000|20110115061644.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS EASIER.     
20110115061644.000|20110115061646.000|CC1| AND CELEBREX IS NOT A NARCOTIC.
20110115061646.000|20110115061646.000|CC1|    WHEN IT COMES TO RELIEVING  
20110115061646.000|20110115061647.000|CC1|       YOUR ARTHRITIS PAIN,     
20110115061647.000|20110115061647.000|CC1|       YOU AND YOUR DOCTOR      
20110115061647.000|20110115061649.000|CC1|   NEED TO BALANCE THE BENEFITS 
20110115061649.000|20110115061650.000|CC1|         WITH THE RISKS.        
20110115061650.000|20110115061650.000|CC1|     ALL PRESCRIPTION NSAIDS,   
20110115061650.000|20110115061653.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,      
20110115061653.000|20110115061653.000|CC1|     MAY INCREASE THE CHANCE    
20110115061653.000|20110115061655.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20110115061655.000|20110115061656.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.   
20110115061656.000|20110115061656.000|CC1|      THIS CHANCE INCREASES     
20110115061656.000|20110115061658.000|CC1|    IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE   
20110115061658.000|20110115061658.000|CC1|         OR RISK FACTORS

20110115061700.000|20110115061702.000|CC1|        FOR LONG PERIODS.       
20110115061702.000|20110115061704.000|CC1|   NSAIDS, INCLUDING CELEBREX,  
20110115061704.000|20110115061704.000|CC1|  INCREASE THE CHANCE OF SERIOUS
20110115061704.000|20110115061706.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS

20110115061710.000|20110115061710.000|CC1| WHICH CAN OCCUR WITHOUT WARNING
20110115061710.000|20110115061712.000|CC1|       AND MAY CAUSE DEATH.     
20110115061712.000|20110115061712.000|CC1|   PATIENTS ALSO TAKING ASPIRIN 
20110115061712.000|20110115061715.000|CC1|         AND THE ELDERLY        
20110115061715.000|20110115061715.000|CC1|    ARE AT INCREASED RISK FOR   
20110115061715.000|20110115061717.000|CC1|   STOMACH BLEEDING AND ULCERS.

20110115065137.000|20110115065139.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NOW CALMLY, STEP BY
20110115065139.000|20110115065141.000|CC1|STEP, LANE TOOK POLICE THROUGH  
20110115065141.000|20110115065143.000|CC1|THE ANATOMY OF A MURDER.        
20110115065143.000|20110115065145.000|CC1|HE SAID IT BEGAN IN A BEDROOM   
20110115065145.000|20110115065149.000|CC1|WHERE HE AND GINGER HAD TRY     
20110115065149.000|20110115065151.000|CC1|AGREED TO TRY AN UNCONVENTIONAL 
20110115065151.000|20110115065152.000|CC1|MEDITATION TECHNIQUE.           
20110115065152.000|20110115065156.000|CC1|HE WOULD VOLUNTARILY CUT OFF HER
20110115065156.000|20110115065158.000|CC1|HAIR SUPPLY BY PRESSING ON HER  
20110115065158.000|20110115065158.000|CC1|NECK.                           
20110115065158.000|20110115065200.000|CC1|IN ESSENCE, CHOKING HER.        
20110115065200.000|20110115065203.000|CC1|WE WOULD TRY MEDITATION THROUGH 
20110115065203.000|20110115065204.000|CC1|CAROTID CONTROL.                
20110115065204.000|20110115065206.000|CC1|WITH ME JUST, YOU KNOW,         
20110115065206.000|20110115065207.000|CC1|TEMPORARILY CUTTING OFF THE     
20110115065207.000|20110115065209.000|CC1|BLOOD SUPPLY TO HER BRAIN SO SHE
20110115065209.000|20110115065212.000|CC1|WOULD GO INTO A STATUS OF WHERE 
20110115065212.000|20110115065214.000|CC1|SHE WAS IN REM SLEEP STATE,     
20110115065214.000|20110115065215.000|CC1|RAPID EYE MOVEMENT.             
20110115065215.000|20110115065216.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT FOR REASONS HE 
20110115065216.000|20110115065218.000|CC1|COULDN'T EXPLAIN, HE SAID THINGS
20110115065218.000|20110115065219.000|CC1|GOT OUT OF CONTROL.

20110115065221.000|20110115065224.000|CC1|ME, I DON'T KNOW WHAT CAME OVER 
20110115065224.000|20110115065224.000|CC1|ME.                             
20110115065224.000|20110115065227.000|CC1|>> WHAT DID YOU DO?             
20110115065227.000|20110115065229.000|CC1|>> I GOT THE HARD SKILLET FROM  
20110115065229.000|20110115065232.000|CC1|THE KITCHEN AND WHACKED HER ON

20110115065233.000|20110115065235.000|CC1|I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT POSSESSED ME

20110115065256.000|20110115065257.000|CC1|>> COULDN'T.                    
20110115065257.000|20110115065300.000|CC1|HE'S NOT SHOWING ANY EMOTION.   
20110115065300.000|20110115065302.000|CC1|AND IF WE SHOW SHOCK OR DISGUST 
20110115065302.000|20110115065306.000|CC1|OR ANY EMOTION WHATSOEVER.      
20110115065306.000|20110115065308.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HE COULD CLAM UP.

20110115065717.000|20110115065717.000|CC1|COMES.                          
20110115065717.000|20110115065720.000|CC1|>> MY BELIEF SYSTEM ALLOWS ME TO
20110115065720.000|20110115065721.000|CC1|ACCEPT ANY SENTENCE THAT'S GIVEN
20110115065721.000|20110115065724.000|CC1|TO ME.                          
20110115065724.000|20110115065725.000|CC1|IT'S VERY DIFFERENT.            
20110115065725.000|20110115065727.000|CC1|MUCH TO MOST PEOPLE'S SURPRISE  
20110115065727.000|20110115065728.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY RUN AROUND WITH

20110115065733.000|20110115065735.000|CC1|AND MY PEERS.
